name: Bossman (jhanson)
description:
The weekend is here and you're excited.  But the boss has other plans.  Battle the boss to see whether you get to have fun, or if you're stuck working on more TPS reports.

Instructions

Use the left and right arrows to move, Enter to advance, and the left mouse button to click any buttons.

Credits

  • Coding and graphics by Jeff Hanson
  • Fonts from dafont.com
  • Sound effects made by Jeff Hanson in Bfxr
  • Music from incompetech.com.  Specifically:
